== Versión Español ==

=== Breve Descripción Personal ===

Tengo 32 años de edad, nací y actualmente vivo en Caracas - Distrito Federal, me empecé a familiarizar con las distribuciones de Software Libre, con Debían GNU/Linux 3.1 (conocida como Sarge) que se publicó el 6 de junio de 2005, para ese año buscando un sistema operativo seguro. Luego de haber escuchado la existencia de Ubuntu, instale por primera vez la versión  6.06 LTS Dapper Drake publicada el	16 de junio de 2006. Sintiéndome agradado por lo fácil de su manejo y entendiendo sus objetivos.

Ahora estoy intentando consolidarme mas con el proyecto y dando a conocer sus beneficios, para ello ingrese en la "Comunidad Ubuntu de Venezuela" y firme el Código de Conducta de Ubuntu.

== English Version ==

=== Brief Personal Description ===

I am 32 years old, I was born, and live in Caracas - Capital District, looking for a secure operating system, I decided to install Debian GNU / Linux 3.1 (Sarge), was released on June 6, 2005, after reading about Ubuntu I decided to switch to Ubuntu version 6.06 LTS Dapper Drake.

Convinced by the easiness to handle and understand of it Ubuntu objectives, I was part of the Ubuntu community in Venezuela, and now i divulge Ubuntu and contributed to its development in Launchpad.

=== Goals ===

Nowadays I am interested in the development that Canonical takes with Ubuntu, is incredible since they have done that "Linux" comes to more persons in the world.  Ubuntu Venezuela is a form of life; there are persons of many regions of the country, all interested parties in the project Ubuntu.  I wait that my witness and interest in the project and in the community, help me to achieve big successes. It is my goal to be an Ubuntu Member, to represent to the Community Ubuntu Venezuela as Local Contact.
